channel.title: Redux on Andryo Marzuki
channel.description: Recent content in Redux on Andryo Marzuki

item.title: React State Management With Redux (and More)
item.description: ReactJS is an awesome library to use for frontends. It’s super fast to use when you want to get a really interactive and intuitive application up and running. ReactJS comes prepackaged with its own way to manage state locally within a component.
